text:
It is not possible to get the url of a proxied document in the sitemap. It may
be convenient to have an input module for fetching the proxied url of a
document. E.g. {proxy-url:{area}:{document-id}:{language}}. I will add a piece
of code which implements this functionality. If you find it useful, please
commit it.
creator: felix.roethenbacher@wyona.com
felix.roethenbacher@wyona.com
text:
Created attachment 14360
[PATCH] Enhancement java class for a proxy-url input module.

Also cocoon.xconf has to be patched:

<?xml version="1.0"?>
<xconf xpath="/cocoon/input-modules">
  <component-instance
    name="proxy-url"
    logger="sitemap.modules.input.proxy-url"
   
class="org.apache.lenya.cms.cocoon.components.modules.input.ProxyUrlModule"/>
</xconf>

Patch applied:

BRANCH_1_2_X  LCR 178626
TRUNK         LCR 178628
creator: andreas@apache.org
